Nobody ever watched the dub, so it kinda went into oblivion

summary: This Quiz Will Tell You Which "Harry Potter" Character You Turn Into When You're Drunk
title: This Quiz Will Tell You Which "Harry Potter" Character You Turn Into When You're Drunk
description:
I got “Albus Dumbledore”!

After a few too many drinks, you become the mom of your friend group. While you love to have a lot of fun, you’re the one that will stop drinking early so that you can take care of your friends. You’re the one that holds back everyone’s hair while they puke and makes sure everyone gets home safe.

reblog.comment:

tags: draco is the biggest Drama queen
summary: I know that Draco is canonically taller then Harry by a few inches but like imagine, if by miracle Harry grew a few inches...
body:
I know that Draco is canonically taller then Harry by a few inches but like imagine, if by miracle Harry grew a few inches himself and Draco now reached like his nose.

Now that you have that in your mind, imagine them arguing and they’re getting up into eachothers faces and suddenly Draco realizes he’s being looked down upon(physically being looked down upon of course, but still.). ‘Malfoy’s aren’t supposed to be looked down upon and definitely not by a stupid Potter’

So he does what he thinks fair, finds the nearest furniture and just climbs it. Draco continues to argue like nothing has changed but Harry isn’t sure how to handle this and shuts up in shocked silence.

Draco believes he has won the argument, Harry doesn’t know how to tell him why he’d kept quiet.

Bonus: if someone walks in and sees what’s happening and just simply walks back out not willing to deal with drarry’s shit.

blog.name: accio-shitpost
blog.title: shitpost managed
blog.description:
FAQ

unforgivably cursing you with our existence since 1965

as seen in Bo Burnham's Eighth Grade, apparently

we have a Discord server! join here! (15+ only please)

we track the tag 'accioshitpost' (without a dash) so if you have art or a fic based on of one of our posts, pop it in there and we'll reblog it for you! we always appreciate your creativity!

you can find our amazon wishlists here and here - if you get us anything, we'll post a picture and a thank you note!!

if you want to follow our personal blogs, here's Roxie's, here's Persephone's, and here's Jamie's

nazis, terfs, pedos, and anybody happy to defend or stand by them can leave. we don't want you. avada kedavra, shithead.

now in blue raspberry flavours, hitting stores soon!

summary: james potter = ariana grande
title: james potter = ariana grande
body: okay so i was listening to the sweetener album rthe other day and while i was listening to borderline i couldn’t help but imagine james potter singing it to lily, whether she was present or not and sirius does the rap and the marauders so the backup and it was a very weird and unexpected thought but i love it

summary: the marauders’ youtube channels
title: the marauders’ youtube channels
body:
james potter
NEVER clickbaits, but all of his titles sound suspiciously clickbaited, but he always delivers. deer puns.

my best friend turns into a dog and eats a fuckload of chocolate, you’ll never believe what happens next… *disgusting*
remus throwing pencils at me for fourteen seconds straight, because he’s not
my pet rat tests shampoo
why i don’t fuck with lily evans
drowning my bedroom in lukewarm candlewax
storytime: three of the four times severus snape tried to end my life
my roommate got a stripper pole
letting a niffler loose in vernon dursley’s bathroom *nsfw*
feeding my dog peanut butter
transfiguration hacks - i’m being useful, for once
‘i got demonetized, so please buy my merch’

sirius black
tries to be a beauty guru for a while, cries while doing liquid eyeliner and never attempts again. occasionally pranks. james is in the back of almost every video, sometimes as a stag.

how 2 lick ur ass *not clickbait*
i peed on peter, i’m sorry, mrs potter
reading my hate mail - mostly from my parents
regulus black being disappointed in me for 3 minutes straight
FEEDING PIGEONS LAXATIVES
how to do winged eyeliner *emotional*
how to have good hair
storytime: i got banned from iceland?
getting james’ ears pierced -  he didn’t know until we got there
spellotaping everything in remus’ room to the ceiling
rEMUS OWNS HANDCUFFS
remus does not own handcuffs: an apology
pissing in vernon’s loafers because he’s a fucking dickwad
‘depressed and well dressed’

remus lupin
he doesn’t even know what his channel is. rarely posts. gives 0 fucks about his content.

my dad is a dick, sirius can relate
riding a stag. no homo
trying, and failing, to ride a broomstick
conspiracy theory - why is sirius’ hair so perfect
headstand competition
game of thrones is great, but there’s too much incest
this is a four-hour long video of me ranting about books
i hate my life
the time i almost died: storyime
have we established that i can’t title videos, i swear this one is exciting
i love the lord of the rings, and the hobbit, can tolkien give me his talent
‘i swear, your fucking grandmother could watch my videos’

peter pettigrew
he wants to be david dobrik. he isn’t.

eating all the burger king food
remus crying over soap operas
sirius meets a trampoline
sirius and james meet a trampoline park
rolling down a hill
selling old quidditch brooms *emotional*
‘i’m in my room again, but that’s only because remus and sirius are shagging on the couch’
